issue.title: Check if these rules are really needed

labels.name: Infrastructure
labels.description: Related to the repository infrastructure

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.53

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

NA

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

I don't remove a rule of `||a.com^` when EL has `||a.com^$third-party` as advised, but I think whether these rules are really needed should be checked. Here the list of such rules:
```
! firstparty
||ads.linkedin.com^
! adservers
||histock.info^
||admanmedia.com^
||adsrv4k.com^
||fireworkadservices1.com^
||getmyfreetraffic.com^
||paibopse.com^
||reevaipi.com^
||sendmepush.com^
||profield.ddns.net^
```

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> What is wrong?

They're mostly redundant with EL.

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://mail.yandex.ru/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.yandex.ru%2F) ### Comment Username: @Selton1 > Реклама в сервисах яндекса использует алгоритмы рандомайзера по максимуму, я видел 15-20 рандомных символов в шапках
, и такие же рандомные шапки держат и остальной контент, единственный способ заблочить такое по моему мнению это создать лист на 2-5 гигабайт со всеми комбинациями или самыми частыми частями этих комбинаций если возможно. - [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

latest

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://meeco.kr/news/36902872

### What filters do you have enabled?

adguard dns, adguard mobile ads, easylist

_No response_

ex) https://meeco.kr/news/36902872

not detected at desktop Edge - with same filters, even when i click posts, too.

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
